name: It Came from the Grave VIC20
name_original: It Came from the Grave VIC20
description:
It Came from the Grave is a pick-up-and-play horror game by Jeffrey Daniels.  It is made entirely in BASIC for the unexpanded VIC 20.  Use the keyboard or joystick to escape the graveyard.  

Control with number keys or a JOYSTICK  (ARROW keys in emulation).  I recommend using a real Vic 20 or VICE emulator in NTSC mode.
